text: Several treaties are named Treaty of Windsor. The most famous is the treaty of 1386 between England and Portugal, the world's oldest recorded allegiance between two nations. *Treaty of Windsor (1175) between England and Ireland. *Treaty of Windsor (1357) between England and France (not ratified). *Treaty of Windsor (1386) between England and Portugal. *Treaty of Windsor (1522) between England and the Holy Roman Empire. *Treaty of Windsor (1899) between England and Portugal.
title: Treaty of Windsor
